soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate cross-functionally with the product and engineering teams
support internal subject matter expert (SME) teams

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing and deploying LLM-based solutions, specifically mentioning RAG architectures and content generation. It also highlights building production-grade software around these models and integrating them with customer data, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
